qas.question: In what way is red used in contemporary fashion?

answers.text: to attract the eyes of the viewer to the person

qas.question: What is the main impact of people wearing red as it relates to the perception of distance?

answers.text: People wearing red seem to be closer

qas.question: Why do monarchs sometimes wear red?

answers.text: to be visible from a distance in a crowd

qas.question: Some professions require employees to wear red because it allows them to be what?
What older period was red used in fashion?
What color causes people to be seen as further away even though distance is the same?
What color is used in modern fashion so the person can be easily found?

plausible_answers.text: Monarchs, wives of Presidential candidates and other celebrities

qas.question: What prominent people do not wear red because they can be easily found in a crowd?

context: <b5_0><b6_0>Red<b6_0/><b5_0/> is used in modern fashion much as it was used in <b4_0>Medieval<b4_0/> painting; <a0_0>to attract the eyes of the viewer to the person<a0_0/> who is supposed to be the center of attention. <a1_0>People wearing red seem to be closer<a1_0/> than those dressed in other colors, even if they are actually the same distance away. <b7_0>Monarchs, wives of Presidential candidates and other celebrities<b7_0/> often wear red <a2_0>to be visible from a distance in a crowd<a2_0/>. It is also commonly worn by lifeguards and others whose job requires them to be <a3_0>easily found<a3_0/>.
